author: jpieper
msg: Remove the "this" identifier from the FSFS reading and writing code,
instead using the invalid revision number.  This implements the
'structure' changes in r9468.
* subversion/libsvn_fs_fs/fs.h
Remove the definition of the "this" identifier.
* subversion/libsvn_fs_fs/fs_fs.c
(read_rep_offsets, representation_string): Use SVN_INVALID_REVNUM
in place of the "this" identifier.

author: ghudson
msg: * libsvn_fs_fs/README: Note steps 6-9 complete.

author: ghudson
msg: Simplify old text-delta code with new convenience function.
* libsvn_delta/text-delta.c (svn_txdelta_next_window): Use
compute_window() once we have the window metadata.

author: ghudson
msg: Use "-1" instead of "this" in FSFS transaction format.  It's not
particularly less clear, and it makes the code a little simpler since
-1 is the string representation of SVN_INVALID_REVNUM.  The FSFS code
is already doing this for copy roots.
* libsvn_fs_fs/structure: Change references from "this" to "-1".  Add
a note that the copyroot field may use -1 for the rev.
* libsvn_fs_fs_/make-revs.c (txn_revstr, txn_repstr): Change "this" to

author: ghudson
msg: In the FSFS dumpfile converter, write deltas against the empty stream
for text representations.
(struct parse_baton): Add fields delta_stream and empty_stream.
(text_write, text_close): Operate on the delta_stream field.
(set_fulltext): Set up pb->delta_stream to write svndiff data to the
rev file.
(main): Initialize pb.empty_stream to an empty stream.
